page.title: 08OAKLEY SOILS
page.content: Oakley Soils have their main offices on the Cambride Road, on the western side of Linton. In the spring of 1985 they took over the premises of a garage just south of the A. 604(bypass road) The premises stand on the old Haverhill Cambridge road, and access onto the bypass is very simple.Oakley Soils has been going since Chistmas 1984 and is owned by Mr. Oakley. There are three mechanics and one apprentice working there. They hope to be building a new work shop soon. They mend Oakley Soils agricultural machinery and their main job is piling and stuctural underpinning. They own 35 road vehicles (agriculture) 2 lorries and 2 tractors.
